Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package helm for versions less than 3.15.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package helm for versions less than 3.15.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package helm is earlier than 3.15.2-1, affected by CVE-2023-45288
